plants.name: Monstera Deliciosa (Swiss Cheese Plant)
plants.description: Known for its large, glossy, and uniquely split leaves, the Monstera Deliciosa adds a tropical touch to any indoor space. It's a fast-growing plant that thrives in bright, indirect light.

plants.name: Fiddle Leaf Fig (Ficus lyrata)
plants.description: With its large, violin-shaped leaves, the Fiddle Leaf Fig is a stylish and popular choice for indoor decor. It prefers bright, filtered light and a consistent watering schedule.

plants.name: Spider Plant (Chlorophytum comosum)
plants.description: The Spider Plant is an easy-to-care-for plant known for its arching green and white striped leaves. It's excellent for hanging baskets and helps purify the air.

plants.name: Peace Lily (Spathiphyllum)
plants.description: The Peace Lily is a beautiful indoor plant with dark green leaves and elegant white flowers. It thrives in low light conditions and is known for its air-purifying qualities.

plants.name: Snake Plant (Sansevieria trifasciata)
plants.description: The Snake Plant, also known as Mother-in-Law's Tongue, features stiff, upright leaves with a striking green and yellow pattern. It's a hardy plant that tolerates low light and infrequent watering.

plants.name: Pothos (Epipremnum aureum)
plants.description: Pothos is a versatile and low-maintenance plant with trailing vines and heart-shaped leaves. It can thrive in a variety of lighting conditions and is perfect for hanging baskets or pots.

plants.name: ZZ Plant (Zamioculcas zamiifolia)
plants.description: The ZZ Plant is known for its glossy, dark green leaves and robust nature. It's incredibly low-maintenance, tolerating low light and infrequent watering.

plants.name: Aloe Vera
plants.description: Aloe Vera is a succulent with thick, fleshy leaves filled with a soothing gel often used for burns and skin care. It prefers bright, indirect sunlight and minimal watering.

plants.name: Philodendron
plants.description: Philodendrons are popular indoor plants with heart-shaped leaves that can be trailing or upright. They are easy to care for and thrive in moderate to low light conditions.

plants.name: Rubber Plant (Ficus elastica)
plants.description: The Rubber Plant has large, glossy leaves and can grow quite tall, making it a striking addition to any indoor space. It prefers bright, indirect light and regular watering.

plants.name: Lavender (Lavandula)
plants.description: Lavender is a fragrant herb with beautiful purple flowers, often used in aromatherapy and cooking. It thrives in full sun and well-drained soil.

plants.name: Rose (Rosa)
plants.description: Roses are classic garden plants known for their beautiful, fragrant blooms in a variety of colors. They prefer full sun and well-drained soil, with regular watering and pruning.

plants.name: Hydrangea
plants.description: Hydrangeas are popular for their large, colorful flower heads that can change color based on soil pH. They prefer partial shade and consistently moist soil.

plants.name: Boxwood (Buxus)
plants.description: Boxwood is a dense, evergreen shrub often used for hedges and topiary. It grows well in full sun to partial shade and prefers well-drained soil.

plants.name: Hosta
plants.description: Hostas are shade-loving perennials known for their lush, variegated foliage. They thrive in partial to full shade and moist, well-drained soil.

plants.name: Daylily (Hemerocallis)
plants.description: Daylilies are hardy perennials with long, arching leaves and vibrant, trumpet-shaped flowers. They prefer full sun to partial shade and are very low-maintenance.

plants.name: Japanese Maple (Acer palmatum)
plants.description: Japanese Maples are prized for their delicate, lacy leaves and beautiful autumn colors. They thrive in partial shade and well-drained soil.

plants.name: Marigold (Tagetes)
plants.description: Marigolds are bright, cheerful annuals that bloom profusely in shades of yellow and orange. They prefer full sun and well-drained soil, making them excellent for borders and containers.

plants.name: Petunia
plants.description: Petunias are popular annuals known for their vibrant, trumpet-shaped flowers that bloom throughout the summer. They thrive in full sun and well-drained soil.

plants.name: Tulip (Tulipa)
plants.description: Tulips are beloved spring bulbs that produce large, showy flowers in a wide range of colors. They prefer full sun and well-drained soil, making them a favorite for spring gardens.
